home-page.title: 👋 Hi, I'm Leander! I write code and play games.
home-page.description: Hey there, My name is Leander Rodrigues. I'm a Software Engineer with some free time, and you found my corner of the internet!

about-page.title: 🔥 About Me
about-page.description: Want to know some more about me? I love sushi, Edgar Wright films, and doing cool stuff online.

projects-page.title: 🔨 Projects
projects-page.description: I've done a bunch of interesting development projects! Well, I think they're interesting, lol.

blog-page.title: 📝 Blog
blog-page.description: A few of my blog posts. I write about video games, movies, life, code, and probably a little too much about fonts.

notes-page.title: 📗 Notes
notes-page.description: Just a bit of my crazed scribblings. I write notes on development tips, for concepts and courses alike! Check them out!

resume-page.title: 👔 Resume - Leander Rodrigues

contact-page.title: 📫 Contact
contact-page.description: I'd love to hear from you! Questions, comments, pull requests, or just say hello! Does that sound desperate? Probably eh?
